head.supplied: Melbourne bot Garden, ¶ 26/7/72 ¶ ¶ By this post, dear Dr Hector, I beg to send you such numbers and plates of my "fragmenta" as are still obtainable, but I regret I cannot make your set complete. Th...

div.p: Folder 3, box 57, James Hector, correspondence received, Museum of New Zealand Te Papa Tongarewa Archives, Wellington.

By this post, dear Dr Hector, I beg to send you such numbers and plates of my "fragmenta" as are still obtainable, but I regret I cannot make your set complete. The work was published in a comparatively small number of copies only, but unexpectedly was distributed to all members of Parliament, Mechanics Institutes &c and thus the supply became exhausted after the sale of many copies.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
Ferd. von Mueller.
MS annotation probably by Hector: 'Recd 9.8.72'.
